Beauty of God.quote: One thing I have asked from the Lord, that I shall seek: That I may dwell in the house of the Lord all the days of my life, To behold the beauty of the Lord. (Psalm 27:4)

Divine Aesthetics.quote: God is beautiful and loves beauty. (Hadith, Sahih Muslim)

Beauty Eternal.quote: Beauty is eternity gazing at itself in a mirror. (Khalil Gibran, The Prophet)

Sacred Beauty.quote: The beautiful is sacred. The sacred is beautiful. (Ancient Greek Maxim)

Transcendent Beauty.quote: Beauty is the splendor of Truth. (Plato)

Divine Form.quote: The form of the beautiful is divine perfection made visible. (Plotinus, Enneads)

Beauty's Nature.quote: Everything has beauty, but not everyone sees it. (Confucius)

Beauty's Source.quote: From His fullness we have all received grace upon grace. (John 1:16)

Beauty's Expression.quote: The world is charged with the grandeur of God. (Gerard Manley Hopkins)

Divine Harmony.quote: Beauty arises from divine harmony and proportion. (Thomas Aquinas)

Beauty's Power.quote: Divine beauty draws the soul toward spiritual truth. (Pseudo-Dionysius)

Beauty's Purpose.quote: The purpose of creation is to manifest divine beauty. (Ibn Arabi)

Beauty's Presence.quote: Wherever there is beauty, there is a reflection of the Divine. (Rumi)

Beauty's Essence.quote: Beauty is the radiance of being itself. (Hans Urs von Balthasar)

Divine Reflection.quote: In all created things resounds the eternal beauty. (Hildegard of Bingen)

Beauty's Wisdom.quote: Beauty is wisdom's face, wisdom beauty's soul. (Sri Aurobindo)

Sacred Aesthetics.quote: The beauty of the Lord shall be revealed, and all flesh shall see it together. (Isaiah 40:5)

Beauty's Grace.quote: Divine beauty flows as grace through all creation. (John O'Donohue)

Beauty's Light.quote: Beauty is the light of being that shines through all forms. (Meister Eckhart)

Divine Splendor.quote: The whole earth is full of His glory. (Isaiah 6:3)

Beauty's Path.quote: Through beauty we are led to contemplation of the Divine. (Plotinus)

Beauty's Attributes.quote: Divine beauty manifests in truth, goodness, and harmony. (Augustine)

Beauty's Vision.quote: Blessed are the pure in heart, for they shall see God. (Matthew 5:8)

Beauty's Mystery.quote: Divine beauty is both revealed and concealed in creation. (Kabbalah)

Beauty's Unity.quote: All beautiful things bear witness to the unity of the Divine. (Ibn al-Arabi)

Divine Aestheticism.quote: The experience of beauty is a glimpse of the divine nature. (Jonathan Edwards)

Beauty's Creation.quote: He has made everything beautiful in its time. (Ecclesiastes 3:11)

Beauty's Revelation.quote: Through beauty the divine glory makes itself known. (Hans Urs von Balthasar)

Beauty's Consciousness.quote: In the consciousness of beauty dwells the divine presence. (Rabindranath Tagore)

Beauty's Transformation.quote: Divine beauty transforms all it touches into itself. (Plotinus)
